project.name: PrinterSetup
project.description:
A CUPs queue configuration tool.
Each queue is described by a PrinterSetupFile (PSF).
PrinterSetup has features to allow it to be used for managing CUPs print queues on both clients and servers.
The project is currently looking for Windows developers who would be interested in porting the system to Windows.
The project is in an early stage of prototyping. As such documentation is limited. However, there are screencasts available to help you people starting out with PrinterSetup to become familiar with some of the features.
The PrinterSetup project aims to provide a cross platform system for print queue deployment.

license.name: gpl
